amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Census Bureau by $173.8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate funding for the re-engineered design process for the 2010 Short-Form Only census.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 71 - 342 (Roll no. 331).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Hefley.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 71 - 342 (Roll no. 331).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
